page.title: 20EFFECTS OF ACID RAIN
page.content: {Acid Rain}affects all types of plant and animal life either directly or indirectly through food chains and webs.Because the food chains and webs are being upset the final consumers such as Otters,Kingfishers and dippers are being severly affected.This is because their food supply is being removed. Any water below the acidity level of {pH5}will not support the hatching of salmon eggs,trout eggs etc.In{Galloway in early spring many of the rivers are pH5.It is possible that within ten years salmon and trout will be exctinct in some Galloway rivers. It is not only fish which are destroyed in lakes and rivers. When acid rain occurs many metals are released into the soil e.g aluminium.High aluminium levels are toxic to plants and humans.
